attributes.action: Save One to One Midwives and secure an alternative birthing solution for women.
attributes.additional_details:
One to One Midwives has been in place for 9 years and has cared for nearly 14,000 families.
Choice is at the centre of everything it does, empowering women and families with all the information needed to make informed decisions about pregnancy and birth including postnatal care. 
The loss of this organisation will leave 100s of women without this dedicated support many having to birth in hospital instead of at home. And will leave 74 Midwives without a job they're passionate about.
attributes.background:
One to one Midwives is a community-based organisation that has recently gone into administration citing its NHS contract no longer being financially viable.
OnetoOne empowers women to make their own choices around prenatal, postnatal and birthing care and offers a dedicated midwife to every woman.
